Tutorial

Getting started

eudtrg requires Python 3. The easiest way to install eudtrg is using pip.

pip install eudtrg

Note

eudtrg currently uses 32bit SFmpq dll to run, so - eudtrg requires Windows installation. - eudtrg requires 32bit Python 3.x

After installing eudtrg, you may test installation by following code

from eudtrg import *

LoadMap('basemap.scx')

b = Forward()

a = Trigger(
   nextptr = b, # Trigger executed after a is b
   actions = [
       SetDeaths(Player1, Add, 1, 'Terran Marine')
   ]
)

b << Trigger(
   nextptr = a, # Trigger executed after b is a
   actions = [
       SetDeaths(Player2, Add, 1, 'Terran Marine')
   ]
)

SaveMap('output.scx', a) # save map with a as starting trigger.
